name: Painless Injection
description: Dental anxiety and dental phobia are real issues facing the profession. It’s estimated that anywhere from 9 to 15 percent of Americans — 30 to 40 million people — avoid dental appointments due to fear and anxiety, which they commonly link to pain associated with the visit.

name: Digital Dental Scanner
description: The advanced Digital Dental Scanner detects Dental Caries in CARIO mode. It is also the only Tooth Scanner that uses auto-fluorescence and selective chromatic amplification.

name: Dental Filling
description: Are your teeth unevenly spaced, irregular, or crowded together? Are they ground down, chipped, or cracked?

name: Root Canal Treatment
description: When decay or disease reaches the pulp of a tooth, you’ll know it. The pain and discomfort that result is unmistakable. The only solution to get rid of them and to save your natural tooth is Root Canal Therapy.

name: Inlays & Onlays
description: Dental Inlay and Onlay are a form of indirect restoration. This means they are made outside of the mouth as a single, solid piece. They will fit the specific size and shape of the cavity.

name: Teeth Guard
description: If every patient would wear a Night Guard,” Dr. Shihabur Rahman has been overheard saying, “I would have only half of the work that I normally would.” Will a Night Guard prevent a cavity?
